sentences.sContent: She rippled a lively rhythm on the violin.
sentences.sCn: 她在小提琴上奏出明快的节奏。

sentences.sContent: The music of the violin blended sweetly with her voice.
sentences.sCn: 小提琴的乐曲和她的嗓音很和谐。

sentences.sContent: He keyed up all the strings of his violin before his performance.
sentences.sCn: 他在表演前将小提琴所有的弦都调好了。

phrases.pCn: 小提琴协奏曲；小提琴协奏曲选

words.tran: 小提琴演奏者，小提琴家

trans.tranOther: a small wooden musical instrument that you hold under your chin and play by pulling a bowacross the strings
